00049 enum PTEID_DocumentType
00050 {
00051         PTEID_DOCTYPE_FULL=0,            /**< Full document : usefull for XML/CSV/TLV export */
00052         PTEID_DOCTYPE_ID,                        /**< ID document : usefull to get value by field */
00053         PTEID_DOCTYPE_ADDRESS,           /**< Address document : usefull to get value by field */
00054         PTEID_DOCTYPE_SOD,                       /**< sod document (if available) */
00055         PTEID_DOCTYPE_INFO,                      /**< info on the card (if available) */
00056         PTEID_DOCTYPE_PINS,                      /**< pins containert (if available) */
00057         PTEID_DOCTYPE_CERTIFICATES       /**< certificates containert (if available) */
00058 };

00097 enum PTEID_CertifStatus
00098 {
00099         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_UNKNOWN=0,           /**< Validity unknown */
00100         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_REVOKED,             /**< Revoked certificate */
00101         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_TEST,                /**< Test certificate */
00102         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_DATE,                /**< Certificate no more valid */
00103         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_CONNECT,             /**< Connection problem */
00104         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ISSUER,              /**< An issuer is missing in the chain */
00105         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ERROR,               /**< Error during validation */
00106         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID,               /**< Valid certificate */
00107         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID_CRL,           /**< Valid certificate through CRL process */
00108         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID_OCSP,          /**< Valid certificate through OCSP process */
00109         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_OCSP_NOT_CHECKED     /**< OCSP was not performed */
00110 };

00144         //GENERAL

00146         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_INSTALL_PRO_DIR,             //string, directory of the pro eid software; �c:/Program Files/pteid/�
00147         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_INSTALL_SDK_DIR,             //string, directory of the sdk eid software; �c:/Program Files/pteid/�

00149         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_LANGUAGE,            //string, user language: fr, nl, en, de, �
00150 
00151         //LOGGING
00152         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_DIRNAME,                     //string, location of the log-file; $home/pteid/ Full path with volume name.
00153         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_PREFIX,                      //string, prefix of the log files
00154         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_FILENUMBER,          //number, Maximum number of log-files; 3
00155         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_FILESIZE,            //number, Maximum number of log-files; 3
00156         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_LEVEL,                       //string, Specify what should be logged; critical, error, warning, info or debug
00157         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_GROUP,                       //number; 0=no (default), 1=yes (create on log file by module)
00158 
00159         //CRL
00160         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_SERVDOWNLOADNR,          //number
00161         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_TIMEOUT,                         //number, timeout in seconds
00162         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_CACHEDIR,                        //string
00163         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_CACHEFILE,                       //string        �$common/crl/
00164         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_LOCKFILE,                        //string
00165 
00166         //CERTIFIACTE VALIDATION
00167         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_ALLOWTESTC,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00168         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_CRL,                       //number; 0=no, 1=optional, 2=always
00169         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_OCSP,                      //number; 0=no, 1=optional, 2=always
00170 
00171         //CERTIFICATE CACHE
00172         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_CACHEFILE,         //string;
00173         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_LINENUMB,          //number
00174         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_VALIDITY,          //number
00175         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_WAITDELAY,         //number
00176 
00177         //PROXY

00179         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_PORT,                          //number
00180         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_PACFILE,                       //string
00181 
00182         //SECURITY
00183         PTEID_PARAM_SECURITY_SINGLESIGNON,       //number; 0=no, 1=yes; If yes, the PIN is requested by the driver and asked only once with multiple applications.
00184 
00185         //GUITOOL
00186         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_STARTWIN,            //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00187         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_STARTMINI,           //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00188         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_SHOWPIC,                     //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00189         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_SHOWTBAR,            //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00190         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_VIRTUALKBD,          //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00191         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_AUTOCARDREAD,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00192         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_CARDREADNUMB,        //number; -1(not specified), 0-10
00193         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_REGCERTIF,           //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00194         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_REMOVECERTIF,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00195         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_FILESAVE,            //string; path to directory where to save eid/xml/csv file
00196 
00197         //XSIGN
